vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Headers
vulnerabilities.description: Missing or incorrect security headers: X-Content-Type-Options, X-Frame-Options, X-XSS-Protection, Content-Security-Policy, Referrer-Policy
vulnerabilities.impact: Increased risk of XSS, clickjacking, and other client-side attacks

vulnerabilities.title: ML-DSA-65 Implementation Not Found
vulnerabilities.description: No ML-DSA-65 digital signature implementation detected

vulnerabilities.title: Rate Limiting Not Implemented
vulnerabilities.description: No rate limiting detected on API endpoints
vulnerabilities.impact: Potential for abuse and DoS attacks
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Implement rate limiting on all API endpoints
vulnerabilities.evidence: Sent 15 requests, no rate limiting detected
